overview:
Gianni is a senior freelance art director and blogger with a passion for nature.

Gianni was born in 1969 and studied arts history with a specialization in graphic design. In time he has collaborated with several important agencies over time, such as LCD and H-art. In 2008, based on his passion for nature, he started Florablog (www.florablog.it), which now counts over 70k visitors per month and covers all things green.Â In 2010 Gianni decides to take his passion even further, developing the idea behind Grow the Planet. He is now CEO of the company, designing its processes, visual identity and curating its contents.
